job.name: recoJob
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv NODEBUG yes starver .DEV2 setenv STARFPE NO echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` set file = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $4}'` else set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set f = 1 set l = 5000 set file = `basename $evtsFile .daq` endif echo "${evtsFile}" if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${file}B.log set output = ${file}.MuDst.root if (-r ${output}) exit 0; # root4star -b -q 'bfc.C(500000,"DbV20130502 pp2012b AgML mtdDat btof fmsDat KFVertex BEmcChkStat Corr4 OSpaceZ2 OGridLeak3D -hitfilt","st_physics_13076023_raw_5020002.daq")' root4star -q -b 'bfc.C('${f}','${l}',"pp2012b,beamline,mtdDat,btof,fmsDat,StiCA,KFVertex,BEmcChkStat,Tree,Corr4,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D,-hitfilt,-evout,NoHistos,noRunco,noTags","'${evtsFile}'","'${output}'")' >& ${logFile}
